alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 10:11AM CST until January 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL CONTINUE THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to Heavy Snow. An additional snow accumulation up to 6 inches expected. The heaviest additional snow is expected in a heavy lake effect snow band across southwest portions of the county, near Little Sturgeon to Brussels to just west of Kolberg. Northwest winds gusting to 25 mph this morning will produce some blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Door County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
